siteConfig.title: RAM EV
siteConfig.description: Official website for the all new RAM ProMaster EV

hero.title: The All-New RAM ProMaster EV
hero.description: Transform your business with customizable models, zero-emission solutions and access to potential tax credits. The future of work is within reach.

specs.description: Maximize Capacity with a 3,020 lb Payload
Drive Clean with Zero Tailpipe Emissions
Long-lasting 110 kWh Battery with up to 162 Miles of Range
Seamless Charging with a Smart Port
Redesigned Side Pocket Door for Easy Access

chargingOptions.title: Charger Options
chargingOptions.description: Charging the Ram ProMaster® EV is easy with the available Level 2 charger. It can charge a battery overnight so it’s ready for work the next day. And recharge the van while on a lunch break with the Level 3 charger, which can charge the van in under an hour. A Level 1 charger also comes standard.

chargingOptions.title: Smart Charging Port
chargingOptions.description: Whether you’re indoors or outdoors, charge up via an available and easy-to-use quick-release mount with a lockable, weatherproof enclosure.

technology.title: Infotainment System
technology.description: Enhance every drive with the Uconnect® 5 system, featuring a 10-inch touchscreen that delivers lightning-fast responsiveness and customizable settings—keeping drivers connected, informed, and in control.

technology.title: Driver Information Digital Cluster
technology.description: Stay informed on the road with the high-tech Driver Information Digital Cluster, featuring a vibrant 7-inch color display that delivers essential driving details—ensuring a smarter, more efficient driving experience.

technology.title: Charging Identification Lights
technology.description: Easily monitor your van’s charging status with five dashboard indicator lights, designed to provide real-time updates. This smart solution keeps you informed and ready to stay productive, even on the busiest worksites.

technology.title: Power Status
technology.description: Stay in control with real-time charging updates right from the cabin. In addition to the digital dashboard gauge, the Uconnect® touchscreen displays charge status, level, and time to completion—along with essential insights like range, nearby charging locations, and more.

businessPoints.title: Tax Benefits
businessPoints.description: Driving an All-New Ram ProMaster® EV can come with tax benefits like the Section 168(k) Tax Deduction that can help boost your bottom line. Dive into the link below to discover how making the switch can be cost-effective for you and your business. Create an account on CommercialEVs.com to see grants and incentives in your area!

businessPoints.title: Big Business Benefits
businessPoints.description: With great business-focused features and benefits like expedited service, shuttles and loaner vehicles, included with the BusinessLink Program, owners can help streamline their businesses as preferred commercial customers.
